Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 8 Minutes

Add ½ cup Water
Add 25 ounces Spaghetti Sauce
Add 8 ounces Whole Grain Spaghetti
Add ½ cup Water (Don't stir)
Async 8 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 8 minutes, (Preheat takes 0 min)
Release steam valve and serve

Ingredients

Spaghetti Sauce 25 ounce
Water 1 cup

Recipe

Estimated Time: 12 Minutes

Add 4 ounces Italian Sausage to instant pot
Timer 4 minutes Instant pot sautee Italian Sausage
Remove Italian Sausage from instant pot
Add ½ cup Water
Add 25 ounces Spaghetti Sauce
Add 8 ounces Whole Grain Spaghetti
Add ½ cup Water (Don't stir)
Async 8 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 8 minutes, (Preheat takes 0 min)
Release steam valve and serve

Ingredients

Baby Bella 8 ounce and wash
Whole Grain Spaghetti 8 ounce
Spaghetti Sauce 25 ounce
Chilli Oil 1 tsp and wash
Water 1 cup
Dash Seasoning 1 unit and wash

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 17 Minutes

Add 1 tsp Chilli Oil 8 ounces Baby Bella to instant pot
Async 9 minutes Instant pot sautee Baby Bella
     |- season with Dash Seasoning
Remove Baby Bella from instant pot
Add ½ cup Water
Add 25 ounces Spaghetti Sauce
Add 8 ounces Whole Grain Spaghetti
Add ½ cup Water (Don't stir)
Async 8 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 8 minutes, (Preheat takes 0 min)
Release steam valve and serve
